mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_ATTENDANCE WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID=#{employeeId} AND DEL_FLG=0;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_ATTENDANCE (EMPLOYEE_ID, ATTENDANCE_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, REST_HOURS, WORKING_HOURS, OVERTIME_HOURS, ABSENCE_HOURS, STATUS_ID, REMARKS) VALUES (#{employeeId}, #{attendanceDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{restHours}, #{workingHours}, #{overtimeHours}, #{absenceHours}, #{statusId}, #{remarks})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_ATTENDANCE SET EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId}, ATTENDANCE_DATE = #{attendanceDate}, START_TIME = #{startTime}, END_TIME = #{endTime}, REST_HOURS = #{restTime}, WORKING_HOURS = #{workingHours}, OVERTIME_HOURS = #{overtimeHours}, ABSENCE_HOURS = #{absenceHours}, STATUS_ID = #{statusId}, REMARKS = #{remarks}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
